author: Julia Alexander
title: Netflix nabs exclusive Pokémon episodes in latest move to dominate children’s television
description: Future episodes of Pokémon, beginning with Pokémon Journeys: The Series, will stream exclusively on Netflix in the United States. The movie is part of a bigger push from Netflix to dominate children’s TV and find more subscribers from “niche” audiences, like …
content:
A staple of kids entertainment on cable is now a streaming exclusive
Netflix has spent years trying to become the new go-to home for kids and family entertainment, investing billions in original content and licensing popular series from some of the biggest h… [+4721 chars]
